snippet: Hanson Dodge Creative and the runner Nick Symmonds are collaborating on a social media campaign ahead of the Olympics.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that Hanson Dodge Creative and the runner Nick Symmonds are collaborating on a social media campaign ahead of the 2012 Summer Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Hanson Dodge Creative and the runner Nick Symmonds are collaborating on a social media campaign ahead of the Olympics.

headline.seo: With a Tattoo, Hanson Dodge Bets on Nick Symmonds
headline.main: A Bet (and Tattoo) on an Olympian
